programme.title: The Hot Zone

programme.title: Gravity

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon, 19910622000000 +0000, The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos, 19910727000000 +0000, Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra, 19911019000000 +0000, The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.

MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats, 19950121000000 +0000, After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast. Can desert patrolmen Jim Archer and Joe Dobson stop the creature before it kills again?
MST3K: Teenage Caveman, 19911109000000 +0000, In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

programme.title: Backlot: The History Of MST3K, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E49, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.
Film Crew The Giant of Marathon, 20071009070000 +0000, The Film Crew rip apart B-Movie legend Steve Reeves and The Giant of Marathon.
MST3K: Cave Dwellers, 19910531070000 +0000, Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.

Blind Spot, 19930502000000 +0000, A woman running for the Senate is jolted by a family tragedy which threatens to become a career ending scandal. Stars Joanne Woodward and Laura Linney. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

So You Said Yes, 20150207000000 +0000, A woman who avoids relationships opens a vintage bridal shop, and goes head-to-head with the snobbish owner of the town's classical bridal shop-only to find out her rival is the mother of her new boyfriend.
It's Christmas, Carol!, 20120101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A modern-day spin on "A Christmas Carol".

I'll Be Home for Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Jackie Foster has the perfect life until her dad Jack returns home and reluctantly agrees to spend Christmas with her and her daughter Gracie. Stars James Brolin, Mena Suvari and Giselle Eisenberg.

Lucky Christmas, 20111112000000 +0000, Holly Ceroni is devastated when she learns her winning lottery ticket is in her stolen car. But what happens when the man behind it falls for Holly? Stars Elizabeth Berkley and Jason Gray-Stanford.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.
Pack of Lies, 19870426000000 +0000, A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E21, Daniel finds a crystal skull identical to one first discovered by his grandfather. When Daniel stares into the skull's eyes, a force makes him disappear. Now SG-1 must find his grandfather to unlock the mystery of the skull and bring Daniel home.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E02, SG-1 responds to a cry for help from a doomed civilization, which promises to give Earthlings access to advanced technology in exchange for supplies that would help them defeat their enemies. But they soon discover that SG-1 may not be helping.

programme.title: Upgrades
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E03, SG-1 is selected to test the effects of alien-tech wristbands on human wearers, and soon find themselves blessed with spectacular strength and speed. But when they are sent on a mission utilizing these new abilities, they learn a shocking lesson.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E04, When a High Priestess from the planet Chulak claims to have a plan that would cripple the Goa'uld, everyone is skeptical. SG-1 must join forces with the Tok'ra in order to put her plan into effect, but a deadly, hidden secret could jeopardize it.

programme.title: Divide And Conquer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E05, When an SGC soldier under the influence of a Goa'uld mind-control device attempts to assassinate a High Council member, SG-1 must uncover other potential assassins, even amongst themselves, before the president arrives for a crucial Summit meeting!

programme.title: Window Of Opportunity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E06, After a visit to a strange planet in the middle of a geomagnetic storm they find themselves repeating the same day over and over again. The team must utilize their accumulated knowledge to stop the time loop before there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E07, SG-1 joins forces with a Russian scientist to investigate a rogue Stargate in Siberia, linked to a mysterious water planet. The team must venture via submarine to the water planet, where they encounter an unexpectedly terrifying alien presence.

programme.title: The First Ones
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E08, During an archaeological survey of fossils on a Goa'uld planet, Daniel is abducted by a fearsome creature, prompting SG-1 to embark on a mission to free him. But Daniel soon learns that the creature's intentions are not what he thought!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E05, After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Childhood's End
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E06, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: 80's Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E06, David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E08, Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Family Tree
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E09, Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Nine Yolks Whipped Lightly
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E12, Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: I'm Using You 'Cause I Like You
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E14, Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: The Final Proof
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E16, Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Eddie Waitkus
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E18, A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Ever Heard the One About the Exploding Father?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E20, Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: The Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E22, Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E24, Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: The Penultimate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E26, David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Ode to Joy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E27, After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Pilot Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E001, Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E002, Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: 13 Yr Old Heimlich/Civil War
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E167, A 5-year-old girl chokes on food with a 15-year-old babysitter. A man suffers a massive heart attack.

programme.title: Xmas Tree, Part 2/6TH Grade CPR
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E225, The continued story of a 16-year-old who falls from a 50 ft. pine while trying to cut the top off. An 11-year-old initiates CPR when his teacher collapses.

programme.title: BVI Dinghy/Silent Intruder
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E326, A rough wave capsizes a family's small dinghy while snorkeling. A woman finds an intruder inside her home.

programme.title: Hugo, Part 2/Snowtubing
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E267, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Denver Chopper
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E138, A television helicopter crew follows a police chase.

programme.title: Ice Dive/Newark Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E146, An ice rescue diver loses is airflow and loses consciousness/ On-scene visit with Newark's University Hospital, one of America's busiest trauma centers

programme.title: Slush Puppy/Kapiolani Hospital
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E339, A Golden Retriever is caught in a freezing river current. A 9-year-old boy is injured when the all-terrain vehicle he's riding flips over.

programme.title: DBL Electrocution/Xmas Tree, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E224, A driver loses control and collides with utility pole causing his and a good Samaritan to be electrocuted. A 16-year-old falls from a 50 ft. pine while trying to cut the top off.

programme.title: Jagged Edge/New Orleans Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E242, Two brothers play tag in their backyard, one falls through the non-safety glass back door. 91 on sight in New Orleans.

programme.title: Wing Walker/Steph Saves Mom
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E101, Flight wing walker finds himself dangling from a steel safety line. 5-year-old calls 911 for her mother

programme.title: Big Bear Crash/Breakout Beagle
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E276, A pilot and his passenger are injured when their plane stalls and crashes. A beagle is trapped in an unexpected place.

programme.title: Stalker/Fire Cracker
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E129, A woman returns home to find her stalker with a knife / A boy calls 911 when a firework he was playing with, exploded.

programme.title: Burning Jeep/Gotta Get to School
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E144, A teenager girl's jeep is hit head-on and she needs to escape before it erupts into flames/ A 5-year-old finds their father unconscious

programme.title: Hayloft Hazard/Special Olympian Hero
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E303, A girl playing with a rope slips off bail of hay. A man is severely stung by yellow jackets.

Stolen by Their Father, 20240616160000 +0000, Fueled by her own childhood kidnapping, Lizbeth fights to get her daughters back from her ex.

The Good Father: The Martin MacNeill Story, 20240616174300 +0000, Weeks after his wife's suspicious death, Dr. Martin MacNeill moves in his mistress under the guise of a live-in nanny. Shocked by her father's actions, his daughter begins to question everything she's known about him while uncovering a web of lies.
Too Young to Be a Dad, 20240616192700 +0000, A teacher (Kathy Baker) tries to help her teenage son (Paul Dano) make the right decision after he impregnates a classmate.

Beyond the Headlines: The Watts Family Tragedy, 20240616210800 +0000, A deeper look into the circumstances surrounding the Chris Watts murder case includes never-before-seen footage and new interviews with Tammy Lee, the agent with the Colorado Bureau of Investigation who elicited Watt's confession.

A Woman Hunted, 20240617040000 +0000, After killing her attacker in self-defense, a woman (Alexandra Paul) with a troubled past tries to cover up the incident.
And Baby Will Fall, 20240617055600 +0000, A man and his wife become prime suspects when a pregnant woman disappears while attending their yard sale.
My Daughter Must Live, 20240617075500 +0000, Desperate to find a liver donor for her child, a woman tries to track down the girl's biological father.
A True Christmas, 20220101000000 +0000, Reminded of her past, Jessica can't stand Christmas, but this holiday season has several surprises in store.

Alone for Christmas, 20130101080000 +0000, When a family visits Grandma's house on Christmas Eve, they leave their dog at home alone. And when burglars try to take the presents from under the tree, the dog must use every trick it knows to stop them.
Angels in the Snow, 20141231000000 +0000, A blizzard traps the dysfunctional Montgomerys in the family cabin at Christmas with the wholesome Tuckers, reminding the Montgomerys how to love.

Christmas Break-In, 20190906000000 +0000, Christmas Break-In is the story of Izzy, a spunky nine-year-old who gets left at school on the last day before Christmas break. Hijinks ensue when three bumbling crooks break in and take the school janitor hostage.

Christmas Coupon, 20201102000000 +0000, An ice-skating champion begins teaching a skating class, but when her former high school sweetheart (and now famous hockey player) brings his niece for lessons, the holidays are filled with a second chance for love.

The Sons of Mistletoe, 20011219000000 +0000, A wealthy benefactor of a boy's orphanage dies suddenly and leaves the estate to his heiress daughter. When she returns home for the holidays with no interest in funding the orphanage, the owner and residents must convince her to change her mind.

A Miracle On Christmas Lake, 20161122000000 +0000, A teen boy struggles with hockey and friends, after he loses his best friend and Dad around Christmas. When an ice rink magically appears on the frozen lake near his home, he reminisces the good times.
Cartoon Christmas Classics, 19900112000000 +0000, Two fun filled hours of rarely seen and highly cherished broadcast television specials and a vintage assortment of theatrical movie studio cartoons.

Cape Cod Christmas, 20181101000000 +0000, When a children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner with her disagreeable siblings before they sell the family house, she reunites with her childhood sweetheart who helps her find a way to keep the home she loves so dearly.

Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S., 20041214000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla, the superior-armed, state-of-the-art, all-robot version of Godzilla, is undergoing repairs after his devastating battle against the world's monsters.

Godzilla: Final Wars, 20051213000000 +0000, Earth has been relatively peaceful since Godzilla was successfully buried deep in ice beneath the South Pole. Then - sometime a few years hence-several of his old nemeses return to wreak havoc on cities worldwide.

Rebirth of Mothra, 19961214000000 +0000, When the three-headed Death Ghidorah, an even fiercer cousin of King Ghidorah, begins to destroy the forests of Japan, Mothra, one of Godzilla's longtime allies (and sometimes foe), leaves her island paradise to help save them.

Rebirth of Mothra 2, 19971213000000 +0000, Two young kids inadvertently unleash a giant sea creature which is strengthened from the abundance of modern-day pollution. Mothra's keepers, the tiny twins Moll and Lora, quickly rouse the gentle giant in order to combat this latest threat to peace.

Rebirth of Mothra 3, 19981212000000 +0000, In the final film in the new 'Mothra' trilogy, King Ghidorah, the most destructive of all the monsters, returns to destroy the Earth. In the end, Mothra is indeed triumphant and takes her place among the greatest of all monsters.

Godzilla Vs. Megaguirus: The G Annihilation Strategy, 20001216000000 +0000, Five years after Godzilla® terrorized the city of Osaka, Japanese scientists have developed a sure-fire way to finally destroy Japan's monster nemesis. They have created the world's first man-made black hole, which will trap Godzilla® for eternity!

Godzilla, Mothra, and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack, 20011215000000 +0000, When a series of terrifying natural disasters begin to plague Japan, including the inexplicable offshore sinking of a U.S. submarine, a mystic old man warns his nation that Godzilla has come back to destroy Japan.

Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla, 20021214000000 +0000, After four years of scrupulous preparation under the prime minister, a new invincible robot, Mechagodzilla, has now reached completion, armed with various weapons, including the most powerful gun in history.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E11, Allie is terrified she may lose the love of her life when Nick gets the bends in a daring attempt to rescue a mini-sub on the ocean floor.

programme.title: Path of Least Resistance
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E12, A dark secret from Dawn's past could jeopardize her career as a Baywatch Hawaii Lifeguard. JD puts his new invention, a double scuba fin, to the test trying to rescue a young boy being sucked into whirring propeller blades in a storm vent.

programme.title: Liquid Visions
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E13, Dawn and Sean are drawn to the strange and spiritual powers of the mind. Kekoa, Allie and Jessie try to save lives after disaster strikes at a party.

programme.title: Lines in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E14, Sean has mixed feelings about Jenna, the beautiful but smug new head of North Shore Lifeguards. When nudists protest on the beach, Sean and Jenna have to work intimately together to save the day, if they don't kill each other first!

programme.title: Thunder Tide
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E15, Kekoa, Dawn and Allie reexamine their femininity. Jason rehearses a love scene with a sexy actress. JD tries to rebound from his breakup with Jessie.

programme.title: Breath of Life
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E16, Dawn saves a skydiver who could be her ex-boyfriend in disguise. Jason is assigned to a Beach where he has to confront a terrible incident from his past.

programme.title: Big Island Heat
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E17, Jason falls for a Kahuna's beautiful granddaughter. Jenna wants to take over the team and shut down the training center she thinks is a waste of money. Sean vows to fight her.

programme.title: The Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E18, Sean reveals a secret to Jenna that could threaten his job. Allie and Jason fly her helicopter to the big island where they have to rescue four people trapped on a volcanic lava reef.

programme.title: Maui Xterra
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E19, Jessie tries to overcome her condition to compete in the Maui triathlon with Dawn as her coach. Allie suspects an agenda behind Dawn's motives. Jason and Kekoa seek a mysterious underwater Hawaiian spirit that lures people to their deaths.

programme.title: Baywatch Ohana
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E20, Sean tries to keep his relationship with Jenna a secret. When the team has to rescue swimmers trapped in a filtration tube, Jenna is sucked down a shaft and Sean risks everything to save her, revealing his darkest secret.

programme.title: The Last Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E21, No longer able to cope with his guilt of surviving the attack on Pearl Harbor, Jessie's grandfather comes to Hawaii to end his life. Can Mitch intervene in time? Kekoa and Sean help a college basketball player learn to swim.

programme.title: The Killing Machine
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E22, Mitch goes undercover to stop an ex-Navy SEAL turned eco-terrorist from detonating a deadly underwater explosive device. When Mitch's dive gear floats to the surface, Sean and the team fear the worst.

programme.title: Soul Survivor
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E01, Sean clashes with Jenna. A new love triangle emerges between new recruit Zack and rookie hopeful Carrie, who’s more interested in Jason. Sean and new lifeguard Leigh Dwyer confront daredevil Cliff, whose dangerous antics disrupt the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Knife in the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E02, A teenager's waverunner causes accidents and his father threatens to sue Baywatch for not rescuing him ahead of his victims. JD takes out his personal problems on Sean. Zack relentlessly pursues Carrie while she pursues Jason.

programme.title: Bad Boyz
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E03, Sean and Jenna clash when she tries to close Baywatch so investors can develop the property. Carrie is afraid she's not lifeguard material after her reluctance to jump into the water from a hovering helicopter.

programme.title: Dangerous Games
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E04, Leigh goes hang gliding with Sam Parks, a daredevil pilot who puts her life in danger. Things go horribly wrong when Kekoa's cousin, Nani, parties on a boat with drunken frat boys and ends up alone in the ocean.

programme.title: Stone Cold
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E05, A plane carrying a donor's heart crashes, and it’s up to Jason to make a desperate dive to retrieve the heart before the patient dies. Two hooligans steal a car and end up trapped underwater. Jenna tries to get Leigh to turn against Sean.
